alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 12:58PM PST until January 04 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Lake Casitas, Ojai Valley, Western Antelope Valley Foothills and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
